data.meta_description: Download this stock image: 1957 - Albert Camus awarded Nobel Prize for literature 1957 44-year old French author Alobert Camus was awarded the Nobel Prize for literature by the Swedish Academy today. OPS: Albert Camus, photographed with Madeleine Renaud, famous French actress during the reception held at Gallimard The Paris publisher, this afternoon.
